name: Greenhost Boutique Hotel Prawirotaman
detail: We lodged in two rooms, one single room on 3rd floor with spacious comfortable bed, clean, neat, though small but very well arranged. Other two bed room on 2nd floor for my two growing boys. Its a modest stay, perfectly match with the location and surrounding. Breakfast is good and sufficient, only need to find the right time to get a nice table near the pool, otherwise the resto is too small for the many guests they have. Staffs are very nice, fast and competent, even to organize and get my rented car parked and retrieved from somewhere, as the parking place in front of the hotel is too small for more than 10cars. The street is narrow and need to be patient for getting in and out with cars, but its yogyakarta anyway, enjoyfull. There is prawirotaman tradisional market at one side of the hotel, the street will be blocked from that end during early morning time. in all, a good priced, well located, artistic and nice hotel, with its forgetable minus.

name: 1O1 STYLE Yogyakarta Malioboro
detail: They gave us an upgrade to a room with a view of Mt Merapi.
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map

name: Gallery Prawirotaman Hotel
detail: They have a nice pool outside and a well aranged breakfast.

name: Prima In Hotel Malioboro
detail: prima in hotel is the best hotel in yogyakarta
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map

name: Cavinton Hotel Malioboro Yogyakarta
detail: I stayed in this hotel for 4 nights. Why I chose this hotel? It because many travellers from Indonesia and outside rated it as excellent hotel in Jogja. This hotel located about 10 - 15 minutes walking from Malioboro and Taman Pintar. Also located near the Bakpia Pathuk shops. I got my room upgraded to excecutive room (wooow) without any additional charge. The room is spacy, so we didn't feel in the small room. This hotel is have good breakfast quality. The service from front desk and staffs were good. I think the price is also cheap enough compared to waht we got here.
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map

name: The Phoenix Hotel Yogyakarta - Handwritten Collection
detail: Been here for the second time and as expected it was amazing
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map

name: The Alana Hotel & Conference Center Malioboro Yogyakarta by ASTON
detail: I have stayed in more than 100 hotels and neo awana is the best ever hotel I have stayed. The staffs are super friendly and willing to give the best service for us. After this neo plus awana will be my only choice in Indonesia. Keep up your excellent service. Well done
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map

name: Melia Purosani Yogyakarta
detail: The exterior of Melia Purosani looks very pretty. It overlooks the cityscape and the position of our assigned room is facing where the sun rise and sets. The deluxe room is huge for 2 persons, and every day there is a complimentary snack. It's a nice gesture after a day out traveling! The restaurant where it serves breakfast has very good chef! the Nasi Padang is our favourite on the Menu. Generally the food quality and taste is above average as it suited our taste buds. One of our good experiences in Yogyarkarta! This hotel is definitely a must-visit! It's a stone throw away from Malioboro shopping district, the Ambarukko mall if you would like some variety shopping and it's a 30-45 mins away from Airport. Such ease! Thank you to the staff who worked tirelessly over the Puasa Holiday to make our experience in Yogyakarta one of the best!
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map

name: Hyatt Regency Yogyakarta
detail: Hyatt Regency Yogyakarta Hotel always been my choice whenever I'm going to Yogyakarta for business or holiday. The breakfast was wonderful (compared to other hotel in Yogyakarta) and with golf view! What's more refreshing than that in the morning to begin your activities! Although the hotel is quite old, they still maintain the hotel and the room itself to stay clean, just like in Bali ...

name: The Capsule Malioboro
detail: Let's review it one by one: PRICE: I'd say the price is fair considering it's a new hotel (that is just my guess). Capsule hotel is suitable for solo traveler or people who only need a place to spend the night. LOCATION: It's good if you want to explore Malioboro area and around. But if you drive your own car, it can be tricky since there will be traffic jam near Malioboro road at night (I stayed at Saturday night). But no worries, parking area for car is available there. CLEANLINESS : I like that the towel is so white and looked like new. Sometimes the closets are wet. STAFF : The water ran out twice during my stay there, first around 7 pm and second around 8.30 am on the next morning. No warning about that and it ran out while I was taking a bath (around 7 pm). When I asked the receptionist, he only said that the water run out and need the tank needs to be filled again for a while. No apologies there. No information on how long it will takes if I didn't ask him about that. Then i had to postpone my bath time. The next day, I had a stomachache and wanted to go to the bathroom when my brother told me that he heard another guest asked about the water. And I ended up not going to the bathroom. I knew it wasn't entirely the staff's fault, but the fact that they couldn't handle the case properly really made me upset and showed me how bad their management is. Also, they let soap dispensers (almost) empty for a while, and it was hard to get soap out of it. FACILITIES : Locker worked well. Inside the capsule is pretty cool with TV and adjustable light. Considering all the factors, I don't think I will be back again. If you are not come alone, there are better places with competitive price you can pick. If you split the cost, I think it won't be that far different from the price here.
area: Yogyakarta City Center,Yogyakarta - View on map
